guidance: Add 'planning' to `tag`, and set `tender.status` to 'planned'\n\nThis is equivalent to a [notice of planned procurement](https://www.wto.org/english/docs_e/legal_e/rev-gpr-94_01_e.htm#_Toc320546103) in the GPA.

Add 'planning' to `tag`, and set `tender.status` to 'planned'\n\nAccording to [Article XI:4](https://www.wto.org/english/docs_e/legal_e/rev-gpr-94_01_e.htm#articleXI) of the GPA, which is reflected in [2014/24/EU](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/eli/dir/2014/24/oj), a contracting authority may reduce time limits by publishing a prior information notice that is not a call for competition.

Add 'planning' and 'tender' to `tag`, and set `tender.status` to 'active'\n\nThis is equivalent to a [notice of planned procurement](https://www.wto.org/english/docs_e/legal_e/rev-gpr-94_01_e.htm#_Toc320546103) being used as a [notice of intended procurement](https://www.wto.org/english/docs_e/legal_e/rev-gpr-94_01_e.htm#articleVII) in the GPA.

Add 'planning' to `tag`, and set `tender.status` to 'planned'\n\nThis is equivalent to a [notice of planned procurement](https://www.wto.org/english/docs_e/legal_e/rev-gpr-94_01_e.htm#_Toc320546103) in the GPA.

Add 'planning' to `tag`, and set `tender.status` to 'planned'\n\nAccording to [Article XI:4](https://www.wto.org/english/docs_e/legal_e/rev-gpr-94_01_e.htm#articleXI) of the GPA, which is reflected in [2014/24/EU](https://eur-lex.europa.eu/eli/dir/2014/24/oj), a contracting authority may reduce time limits by publishing a prior information notice that is not a call for competition.

Add 'planning' and 'tender' to `tag`, and set `tender.status` to 'active'\n\nThis is equivalent to a [notice of planned procurement](https://www.wto.org/english/docs_e/legal_e/rev-gpr-94_01_e.htm#_Toc320546103) being used as a [notice of intended procurement](https://www.wto.org/english/docs_e/legal_e/rev-gpr-94_01_e.htm#articleVII) in the GPA.
If unchecked, set `tender.status` to 'planned'. If checked, add 'tender' to `tag`, and set `tender.status` to 'active'.
Add 'planning' to `tag`.
If unchecked, set `tender.status` to 'planned'. If checked, add 'tender' to `tag`, and set `tender.status` to 'active'.
Add 'tender' to `tag`, and set `tender.status` to 'active'.

Add 'award' and 'contract' to `tag`. If the notice has one or more `/AWARD_CONTRACT/AWARDED_CONTRACT` (*A contract/lot is awarded*) elements, set `tender.status` to 'complete'. Otherwise, if the notice has one or more `/AWARD_CONTRACT/NO_AWARDED_CONTRACT/PROCUREMENT_UNSUCCESSFUL` (*No tenders or requests to participate were received or all were rejected*) elements, set `tender.status` to 'unsuccessful'. Otherwise, set `tender.status` to 'cancelled'.
Add 'planning' to `tag`.
If unchecked, set `tender.status` to 'planned'. If checked, add 'tender' to `tag`, and set `tender.status` to 'active'.
Add 'planning' to `tag`.
If unchecked, set `tender.status` to 'planned'. If checked, add 'tender' to `tag`, and set `tender.status` to 'active'.
Add 'tender' to `tag`, and set `tender.status` to 'active'.

Add 'award' and 'contract' to `tag`. If the notice has one or more `/AWARD_CONTRACT/AWARDED_CONTRACT` (*A contract/lot is awarded*) elements, set `tender.status` to 'complete'. Otherwise, if the notice has one or more `/AWARD_CONTRACT/NO_AWARDED_CONTRACT/PROCUREMENT_UNSUCCESSFUL` (*No tenders or requests to participate were received or all were rejected*) elements, set `tender.status` to 'unsuccessful'. Otherwise, set `tender.status` to 'cancelled'.
Add 'planning' to `tag`, and set `tender.status` to 'planned'.

Add 'award' and 'contract' to `tag`. If the notice has one or more `/AWARD_CONTRACT/AWARDED_CONTRACT` (*A concession/lot is awarded*) elements, set `tender.status` to 'complete'. Otherwise, if the notice has one or more `/AWARD_CONTRACT/NO_AWARDED_CONTRACT/PROCUREMENT_UNSUCCESSFUL` (*No tenders or requests to participate were received or all were rejected*) elements, set `tender.status` to 'unsuccessful'. Otherwise, set `tender.status` to 'cancelled'.
